org.xmlserializer4j

Interface ObjectReferenceContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsObjectReferenceContext, HashCodeReferenceContext, IdReferenceContext

    public interface ObjectReferenceContext

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createReference(java.lang.Object object)
      Creates and returns a reference for object.
      java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String reference)
      Returns the object for the given reference.
      java.lang.String getReference(java.lang.Object object)
      Returns the reference for object or null if absent.
      void mapObjectElement(java.lang.Object object, org.w3c.dom.Element element)
      Maps the XML element representing object.
      void mapReferencedObject(java.lang.String reference, java.lang.Object object)
      Maps a referenced object for lookup when the reference is encountered again.
      void setReferenced(java.lang.Object object)
      Sets the object as referenced.
